title: Saturday, October 22, 2022
description: President Biden's student loan debt relief plan is on court-ordered hold. The January 6th committee wants Donald Trump to testify under oath. Former British Prime Minister Boris Johnson may attempt a comeback.
copyright: Copyright 2015-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
